title: Hour 2 - Wright Thompson (05-22-20)
itunes:title: Hour 2 - Wright Thompson (05-22-20)
description:
The Author of History of Flight Wright Thompson tells Dan that Michael Jordan is really a country boy when you search his roots. Wright says that History of Flight was planned to come out when it did.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
